name: PCTI PowerSchool Dark Theme
description: This is a dark theme for the PCTI PowerSchool page
additional_info:
Version 2.3
Bulletin color fix.

Version 2.2 
Turns out I broke a whole bunch of stuff in version 2.1 that made it pass internal testing
All calendars should now be in the proper color and visible on every page.

Version 2.1
Fixed everything from update to powerschool's ui change
Added a bunch of code to fix the stupid calendar issue, the font should now be visible.
Fixed a whole bunch of internal issues with colors overwriting.

Version 1.6:
Updated a whole bunch of stuff and fixed a whole bunch of issues. Too many to count.
Also removed puppy from 404 page.

Version 1.5: 
Adds many user suggested changes such as borders around the navigation tabs and adding a puppy to the 404 page.

Version 1.4:
Adds a border around 2 boxes on the homepage and makes locker number and code readable.

Version 1.3: 
This update fixes the invisible text when a user has been idle for too long.

Version 1.2:
This update makes the text that appears on the honor roll page more readable in brighter conditions.
 
Version 1.1: 
This update fixes some errors that would cause text to appear invisible on progress reports and report cards.

Version 1.0: 
This is version 1 of the dark theme for the PCTI PowerSchool. Send me suggestions for other colors or any errors you find!
